name: ML Inference - Text Generation
description: Fast text generation using open-source LLMs (Llama 4, Granite, Llama 3.3 70B). OpenAI-compatible API. Models: nano ($0.01), fast ($0.013), smart ($0.011), big ($0.017).

model.description: Model tier. nano=fastest, fast=capable, smart=reliable, big=highest quality. Default: fast
